.. _`Resources`:

Resources
=========
This section describes class and functions private to <application-name>. It is intended to document how the application works

labs.lab-1
----------
Created a pull request *fire emoji x3*

labs.lab-2
----------
Created and activated a virtual environment and instal flask

labs.lab-3
----------
Created and connected to a database in postgres

labs.lab-4
----------
Connected to the postgres database and created sql queries

labs.lab-5
----------
Created a trash ass UI to anger the user and make them have a bad time

labs.lab-6
----------
Connected to a new database

labs.lab-7
----------
Validized and sanitated inputs aswell as error handled

labs.lab-8
----------
Javascript

labs.lab-9
----------
Unit tested code 

labs.lab-10
-----------
Wrote short descriptions of all previous labs while learning how to document
